addCustomer.description: Add a new customer to your Cryptolens account

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the customer (max 100 characters)

props.name: email
props.description: The email of the customer (max 100 characters)

props.name: companyName
props.description: The company name the customer belongs to (max 100 characters)

props.name: notes
props.description: Optional notes field (max 1000 characters)

props.name: enableCustomerAssociation
props.description: If enabled, a portal link will be returned where the customer can view their licenses

props.name: allowActivationManagement
props.description: If enabled, the customer can activate and deactivate devices through the customer portal

props.name: allowMultipleUserAssociation
props.description: If enabled, multiple user accounts can be associated with this customer

blockKey.description: Block a license key to prevent it from being accessible by most Web API methods

props.name: productId
props.description: The product ID

props.name: key
props.description: The serial key string to block

createKey.description: Create a new license key for a product

props.name: productId
props.description: The product ID

props.name: period
props.description: The number of days from today the license key should be valid. Default is 0 (no expiration).

props.name: f1
props.description: Enable Feature 1

props.name: f2
props.description: Enable Feature 2

props.name: f3
props.description: Enable Feature 3

props.name: f4
props.description: Enable Feature 4

props.name: f5
props.description: Enable Feature 5

props.name: f6
props.description: Enable Feature 6

props.name: f7
props.description: Enable Feature 7

props.name: f8
props.description: Enable Feature 8

props.name: notes
props.description: Additional notes about the license key (max 500 characters)

props.name: block
props.description: Block the key from being accessed by the Activation method

props.name: customerId
props.description: The ID of the customer to associate with this license key

props.name: trialActivation
props.description: Enable or disable trial activation

props.name: maxNoOfMachines
props.description: The maximum number of computers that can activate the key. Default is 0 (unlimited).

props.name: allowedMachines
props.description: A list of machine codes (separated by new lines) that will be prioritized during activation

props.name: resellerId
props.description: The ID of the reseller to associate with this license key

props.name: noOfKeys
props.description: The number of keys to generate. Default is 1. Maximum 1000 per request.

extendLicense.description: Extend a license key by a specified number of days

props.name: productId
props.description: The product ID

props.name: key
props.description: The serial key string to extend

props.name: noOfDays
props.description: The number of days to extend the license. Use negative numbers to decrease the expiration date.

newApiEvent.description: Filter events for a specific product (optional)

props.name: productId
props.description: Filter events for a specific product (optional)

props.name: key
props.description: Filter events for a specific license key (requires Product ID)

props.name: states
props.description: Filter by event states (comma-separated numbers). E.g., 1010 for validation, 2010 for activation, 3010 for key creation, 6010 for deactivation

props.name: limit
props.description: Maximum number of events to fetch per poll (default 100, max 1000)
